0.0.1.name: wordpress/wp-fileman
0.0.1.description:
This plugin as of now is under heavy development

this is a fork of original wp-fileman to have following features (will not have all the features from release one)

  • work directly from plugins folder instead of copy pasting to wp-admin.
  • Ajax based interface
  • Code editor for script fles
  • WYSIWYG editors for html files
  • Image editor for image files
